attributes.action: Remove welfare benefits from known smokers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should hard working tax payers have to help support the addiction of smokers on benefits?  Furthermore, why should they then face the double whammy of funding addiction and than having to foot the NHS bill to treat the illnesses of smokers.

IF PEOPLE CAN AFFORD TO SMOKE THEY DONT NEED WELFARE BENEFITS.

This may also work as an incentive to get people to give up smoking or to get a job.
